name: Boing Boing darkened
description: They changed their rules, again, so this is broken, again; and I’m not going to fix it anytime soon as I don’t go to their site anymore since June 2011. This was just a dark version of their site.
additional_info:
version 2.4 (oops, the top blue link wasn't teal) got the white link in there, too, and matched the 
orange better

Also, restores the navigation links in the tv subdomain to their original colors and does a bit of 
styling to bring that domain up to par.
